name: Trash Tycoon
description:
My entry to the sea jam.

Try to keep the beach clean as long as possible by building factories and placing workers.

There is no winning condition. Just keep the beach clean. If there is to much trash you will see a (broken) game over screen. [The deadline was due, i will fix that later :)] 

A nice little project for me to learn some pygame.

Keys:
  • F - Toggle Fullscreen
  • M - Mute Music
